column2: Replace the spells and wands in the shop with card packs
Show the sum of recently accumulated gold in the log
Show the sum of recently accumulated gold near the player character
Gain 10 frames of invincibility when taking damage from enemies
The player character will blink while they are invincible
Heal for the amount gained when your health increases
Heal completely when your health increases
Projectiles shot by the player will have reduced cosmetic particle effects
All entities will have reduced cosmetic particle effects
Cosmetic particle effects will be completely disabled instead of reduced
Generate 2 random wands at the start of your run
Use less repetitive custom logic to generate the random starting wands
Randomize the player's cape colour at the start of your run
Randomize the player's max health at the start of your run (from 50 to 150)
Replace any starting flasks with random flasks at the start of your run
Obtain a random perk at the start of your run
Enemies may spawn as Champions that are stronger and gain a special modifier
Every 50 kills you may encounter a Champion with many modifiers that drops a chest when defeated
Champions may spawn with multiple modifiers
A challenge mode where the enemies become stronger and more aggressive
An even harder modifier for Hero Mode
Collecting orbs will increase enemy difficulty while in Hero Mode
Entering new biomes will increase enemy difficulty while in Hero Mode
Allow Goki's Things to override other loadout mod behaviours\nMust be enabled to use multiple loadout mods together\nGoki's Things MUST be above other loadout mods in the mods menu!
A quick toggle to disable loadout selection without having to disable all the loadout mods
Apply any custom cape colour the loadout defines
Apply any custom player sprites the loadout defines
If the Selectable Classes mod is enabled, add all loadouts managed by Goki's Things to the class selection area
If certain loadout spells would be locked, don't lock them
Your wands will recharge while holstered
Allow Unique Wands to rarely appear in place of normal wands
Any applicable spell can spawn on any wand regardless of the wand's level
Allow spells that usually do not spawn on wands to spawn on wands
Replace all spells on all wands with completely random spells
Replace the preset wands from the first biome with procedural level 1 wands
Add health bars to enemies that have taken damage
Draw the health bars using sprites which is heavier on performance
Gold nuggets will decay into gold powder instead of disappearing completely
Collect all gold nuggets on the map
Nearby gold nuggets will be merged into one to reduce physics load
Add an FPS counter to the screen
Show challenge modes as icons on the right side of the screen
Show entity names when targeting them
Show perk descriptions when targeting them
Show persistent damage numbers over enemies
Hide the Goki's Things button in the top right after 5 seconds of menu inactivity
Player projectiles will be random colours
Alt-fire to swap between two different item hotbars
Chests and Super Chests have a chance to drop a perk instead
Allow Goki's Things to disable actions and perks from the base game and other mods
Show tips about Goki's Things at the start of each run
You can disable these tips in the Goki's Things options menu.
Make sure you actually read Goki's Things options! If there's a new option, click the ? to see what it does.
You can disable content from other mods and the base game by enabling Manage External Content.
If hundreds of damage numbers are making you lag, try the Show Damage Numbers option in Goki's Things!
If you play a lot of New Game++ and beyond, consider enabling Combine Gold to reduce lag.
Don't like spell shops? Enable Wand Shops Only in the Game Modifiers tab!
If your wand causes a lot of lag, consider temporarily disabling particles on Options Page 2.
Want to know what Perks do before you pick them up? Enable Show Perk Descriptions on Options Page 2.
Add a target dummy useful for testing spells and damage to each Holy Mountain
Allows the tracker to include environmental and untracked damage
Add a spell slot machine to each Holy Mountain
Add a shop reroller to each Holy Mountain
Keep the player in the center of the screen
Enable random events during gameplay (work in progress)
Allow the toggling of content that was removed from Goki's Things
50% damage resistance, melee and knockback immunity
Fire immunity, set nearby things on fire. Projectiles set things they hit on fire
Counter attack with a white projectile that explodes after some time
Melee, projectile, and dash damage increased
Electrocute nearby materials Projectiles electrocute things they hit
200% additional walking speed, 100% additional flying and jumping speed
Freeze nearby entities and materials Projectiles freeze things they hit
Shoot a burst of freezing projectile upon taking damage
Spawn rats, spiders, blobs, or frogs upon death
Projectiles gain additional bounces (4 or 2x existing bounces, whichever is higher)
Additional projectiles, additional projectile range, predicts ranged attacks
67% increase in melee, projectile, and dash rate
If damage hasn't been taken in the last second, rapidly recover missing health
Spawn a chest on death (used for mini-bosses)
Teleport randomly or when taking damage (must be near the player)
Projectiles gain a trail of toxic sludge
Gain frames of intangibility when taking player damage
Blood sprays out when taking damage
Cause a localized earthquake on death
You will face many difficult enemies.
You will face difficult enemies and encounter very dangerous creatures.
You will face very difficult enemies.
You will face many difficult enemies and encounter very dangerous creatures.
You will face many very difficult enemies.
You will face very difficult enemies and encounter very dangerous creatures.
You will face many very difficult enemies and encounter very dangerous creatures.
You are strong, but so are your foes and they will stop at nothing to kill you.
You are strong, but so are your foes and they will stop at nothing to kill you.\nCollecting artefacts is dangerous.
You are strong, but so are your foes and they will stop at nothing to kill you.\nEnemies grow stronger as you explore.
You are strong, but so are your foes and they will stop at nothing to kill you.\nCollecting artefacts is dangerous and enemies grow stronger as you explore.
The world is unfamiliar. Death feels closer than ever.
Fire rate and spread improves over time while you aren't firing.
A random spell on your wand has been promoted to always cast.
Your projectiles cause larger, more destructive explosions.
You fire an additional projectile with each spell cast, but cast spells less quickly.
Receive 75% less damage, but damage is permanent.
You heal for the amount gained when gaining maximum health.
You become immune to enemy damage for a short time after taking enemy damage.
You are no longer affected by knockback or stunlock.
The gift of that which was forgotten.
Control a magic light that cuts through darkness.
Your wands recover mana more quickly.
Your flasks can now hold twice as much.
You cast 2 additional spells per cast.
You cast all of your wand's spells at once.
Your wands recharge even when holstered.
Your damage increases the closer you are to death.
Cast spells much more rapidly, but less accurately.
You are more resistant to damage from status ailments.
Confuse your enemies by swapping places with your attacker.
From now on Holy Mountain shops will carry two additional items.
Each of your spells triggers the next when it expires.
A random always cast spell on your wand has been demoted.
Your life force is used in place of mana, but you take 5x damage.
From now on wands you find will have their mana and mana recharge stats reallocated and slightly improved.
From now on wands you find will have slightly better stats.
Your projectiles move at hyper speed.
You experience no recoil as long as you are grounded.
You can no longer anger the gods.
The next stackable perk you take will be taken three times, but your max health is reduced.
This perk is missing its localization data!
A high powered shot of focused arcane energy
Increases spell damage with each bounce
Cast a spell that attempts to avoid world collisions
Cast a copy of the next unlimited use spell (or cast the next spell if no valid spell exists)
The next spell cast is doubled
The next spell cast is tripled
Cast a spell that gains an additional projectile
Cast a spell that makes enemies it hits bleed gold
Increases the damage done by a spell over time
Control a magic light that cuts through darkness
Cast the next spell for half mana
Your wand recovers mana a little faster
Cast a spell that reflects projectiles
Cast all remaining spells in a circular pattern
Your wand casts spells in order
Your wand recharges even while holstered
Projectiles pierce entities, passing through them
Projectiles perforates entities, passing through them
Cast a spell with increased damage and material penetration
Cast a spell that gains 4 additional projectiles with random muzzle velocity
Cast 3 spells of which the first attracts the others
Cast 5 spells of which the first has the others orbit around it
Cast a spell that reveals the area around enemies it hits
Randomize the order of all remaining spells
Cast a spell that passes through materials
Cast 2 spells that are merged together
Cast a spell that bounces energetically
Projectiles deal half their damage in a radius around them, but cost 2x more mana to cast
Projectiles gravitate back towards where they were cast from
Cast a spell with unrivaled bouncing potential
Increase mana cost by 3x to dramatically reduce current cast delay and recharge time
Cast a spell that casts another spell when it expires
Cast a spell that casts another spell upon collision
Cast a spell that casts another spell after a timer runs out
Projectiles gain a trail of barriers
Projectiles gain a trail of explosions
Cast an uncontrolled burst of projectiles
A short lived spark of electricity
Summon a magical phenomenon that casts a spell when you stop casting
The projectile is held in place a set distance from the tip of your wand
You can feel the pull of treasures around you.
Hurl some of your hard earned gold at the enemy. Requires 10 gold
Cast a spell with a 3x higher mana cost that can not directly damage you
The projectile jumps from enemy to enemy
Cast 3 spells, each triggering the next when it expires
Summon a magical phenomenon that casts a spell in a random direction 5 times
The projectile has reduced terminal velocity and added lifetime
The projectile is influenced by your movement
Cast a spell that sticks to surfaces
Cast a spell that is greatly attracted towards an adjacent target, but quickly slows down with no targets nearby
Spend 5x the mana to fire the projectile many times in a circular pattern
Cast 2 spells the first of which drops multiples of the second over time
Cast 2 spells that keep moving in the direction they were cast
A large chunk of magical ice or something
Projectiles cause larger, more destructive explosions
Cast a spell with an unlimited duration and destroy any existing bound spells
The projectile is influenced by your aim
Cast 2 spells the second of which will expire when the first expires
Cast 4 spells, each one following the previous
The projectile is unaffected by gravity
Decreases the knockback of the projectile
Decreases the speed at which the projectile flies through the air
Projectiles return to the caster if they're too far away
Fire projectiles more quickly at the cost of accuracy and damage
Projectiles rotate and accelerate towards the nearest target in front of them
Projectiles are affected by a very low terminal velocity
Shoot 3 projectiles in quick succession based on current cast delay
Cast a spell that explodes and casts another spell towards a nearby enemy when it enters proximity
Cast a spell that splits into 3 weaker versions of itself when it expires
Cast the next spell for half mana, but it will not create projectiles
The projectile flies with a curious flight path
The next spell deals 5x more damage but costs 3x more mana
Cast a spell that casts another spell repeatedly
Cast the next spell whenever you take damage
Mana cost up, cast delay reduction nerfed, not as OP in general
Rebalanced to add flat damage and critical change instead of all flat damage
Removes the laggy particle effects (alters gameplay)
Shorten the blindness effect to 10 seconds
Will no longer trigger on self or environmental damage
Will no longer trigger on self or environmental damage
3x damage dealt, 3x damage taken, no health reduction, no explosion radius changes
Damage every 5 frames instead of every frame
Fixes targeting issues and script typos
Limits stun lock to 10 frames instead of until you hit the ground
Allows Projectile Enchantment to negate the electrical damage
Allows the spell to uncover dark areas
Complete spell rewrite to greatly improve performance
Modifier works on frame 1 instead of frame 2
Modifier works on frame 1 instead of frame 2
Reduces enemy blood multiplier each time they are shot
Allows actions that restore mana to work even if they are always cast
Gives each projectile in a spell cast its own trigger logic (eg; triplicate bolt with trigger)
A bag in which to hold your spells
Hold in hand and walk over spells to pick them up, hold in hand and click to pluck a random spell out
A flask that destroys its contents
A challenge option that disables 10% of spells at the start of the run
Generate spells that are a combination of 3-6 other spells
Wands have more mana, but do not recharge mana.
Try to outrun the ever expanding goo! You'll drown if you get stuck in it, so move quickly!
A mysterious killer goo is consuming everything it touches! Avoid it at all cost!
Corruption is spreading and converting the world. Don't get caught up in it!
Some pretty pink goo is making everything cute and fluffy. Will this be your fate, too?
The floor is lava? How about the world is lava! Get away from that hot goo!
Wands will not generate naturally in the world.
Generated wands will have at least 1 Always Cast spell.
Generated wands will be Shuffle: Yes.
Generated wands will be Shuffle: No.
Shops will only have wands in them.
Shops will only have spells in them.
Items in the shop will cost no gold.
Your kills leave no corpses behind.
Wands that aren't considered special (loadouts, challenges, duplicates, merged, etc.) are removed from the world.
Deadly barriers appear where you've recently been. Avoid them!
You move to the previous Holy Mountain upon taking damage.
You can kick spells off of wands.
Enemies gain invincibility frames when taking player damage.
Enemies gain intangibility frames when taking player damage.
